All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Account
The Account class represents a bank account with relevant details such as account ID, type, username, password, balance, and status.
AccountInformationPage
This class represents the GUI for displaying account information.
AccountInformationPageTest
This class tests the functionality of the AccountInformationPage class.
AccountManager
Manages account-related operations.
AccountOverviewPage
The AccountOverviewPage class is part of the control package of the VirtualBankV2 application.
AccountOverviewUI
The AccountOverviewUI class is a user interface for displaying and managing user accounts.
AccountOverviewUITest
This class represents the GUI for displaying account overview.
AccountTest
 
ChildLock
Represents a child lock window for a virtual bank application.
ChildLockManager
The ChildLockManager class is part of the control package of the VirtualBankV2 application.
ChildLockTest
This class represents the GUI for displaying child lock functionality.
ContactUsPage
The ContactUsPage class represents the customer service page of the Virtual Bank application.
ContactUsPageTest
This class tests the functionality of the ContactUsPage class.
CreateGoalUI
The CreateGoalUI class represents the user interface for creating a new goal in the Virtual Bank application.
CreateGoalUITest
This class tests the functionality of the CreateGoalUI class.
CreateTaskController
The CreateTaskController class is responsible for managing the interactions between the CreateTaskPage view and the underlying task creation logic.
CreateTaskPage
CreateTaskPage class provides a user interface for creating new tasks within the Virtual Bank application.
CreateTaskPageTest
This class tests the functionality of the CreateTaskPage class.
FAQ
The FAQ class is a user interface for displaying frequently asked questions (FAQ) about the Account Management System.
FAQTest
This class tests the functionality of the FAQ class.
FeatureIntroPage
The FeatureIntroPage class extends JFrame and is used to display the feature introduction page of the Account Management System.
FeatureIntroPageTest
This class tests the functionality of the FeatureIntroPage class.
Goal
The Goal class represents a financial goal with relevant details such as goal name, description, target amount, current amount, and the associated username.
GoalManager
The GoalManager class provides functionality to manage user goals in the Virtual Bank application.
GoalManagerTest
 
GoalOverviewUI
The GoalOverviewUI class represents the goal overview interface for the Virtual Bank application.
GoalOverviewUITest
This class tests the functionality of the GoalOverviewUI class.
GoalTest
 
HomePage
HomePage class provides a home page for the Virtual Bank application.
HomePageController
The HomePageController class is responsible for handling user interactions on the home page of the Virtual Bank application.
HomePageControllerTest
 
HomePageTest
This class tests the functionality of the HomePage class.
HorizontalLineBorderTest
This class tests the functionality of the HorizontalLineBorder class.
Interest
The Interest class represents the interest details associated with a user's account.
InterestController
This class handles the interest calculation and updating process.
InterestControllerTest
 
InterestMessagePage
This class represents the interest message page of the virtual bank application.
InterestMessagePageTest
This class tests the functionality of the InterestMessagePage class.
InterestTest
 
LoginController
The LoginController class provides the logic to check user credentials during the login process for the Virtual Bank application.
LoginControllerTest
 
LoginPage
The LoginPage class represents the login page for the Virtual Bank application.
LoginPageTest
This class tests the functionality of the LoginPage class.
OpenAccountPage
OpenAccountPage is a GUI class that allows users to open a new account.
Reader
The Reader class provides methods to read data from CSV files and populate lists of various entities, such as users, accounts, transactions, tasks, goals, and support information.
ReturnButton
Utility class for creating a return button with custom functionalities.
RoundedButton
A custom JButton with rounded corners.
RoundedLabel
The RoundedLabel class extends JLabel.
RoundedLabelTest
 
RoundedPanel
The RoundedPanel class extends JPanel and is part of the entity package of the VirtualBankV2 application.
RoundedPasswordField
The RoundedPasswordField class extends JPasswordField and is part of the entity package of the VirtualBankV2 application.
RoundedPasswordFieldTest
 
RoundedTextField
The RoundedTextField class extends JTextField and is part of the entity package of the VirtualBankV2 application.
RoundedTextFieldTest
 
SignUpController
The SignUpController class handles the logic for the user sign-up process in the Virtual Bank application.
SignUpControllerTest
 
SignUpPage
The SignUpPage class represents the sign-up page for the Virtual Bank application.
SupportSystem
The SupportSystem class represents the support information in the system, including FAQs, guides, and contact information for support.
SupportSystemTest
 
Task
The Task class represents a task in the system, including details such as task ID, description, title, start and end dates, associated user, reward, and completion status.
TaskOverviewUI
TaskOverviewUI class represents the user interface for managing tasks.
TaskOverviewUITest
This class tests the functionality of the TaskOverviewUI class.
TaskTest
 
Transaction
The Transaction class represents a financial transaction between two accounts in the system.
TransactionHistoryPage
Represents a page displaying transaction history for a specific account.
TransactionManager
This class handles the logic for transferring money between accounts and recording the transactions.
TransactionManagerTest
 
TransactionPage
TransactionPage class represents the GUI for performing transactions.
TransactionPageTest
This class tests the functionality of the TransactionPage class.
TransactionTest
 
User
The User class represents a user account in the virtual bank system.
UserManual
The UserManual class represents a GUI window that displays the user manual of the Virtual Bank application.
UserManualTest
This class tests the functionality of the UserManual class.
UserTest
 
VirtualBankApplication
VirtualBankApplication class is the main class that initializes and runs the virtual bank application.
VirtualBankApplicationTest
 
Writer
The Writer class is responsible for writing various data entities to CSV files.
